title: Construction costs for selected airports up to 2012
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Costs in billion euros for 6 number of Airports.
The Costs in billion euros is highest at Airport Hong Kong (China) and lowest at Airport Berlin-Brandenburg (Germany).
The highest Airport Hong Kong (China) has 12.9 more Costs in billion euros than the lowest Airport Berlin-Brandenburg (Germany).
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Costs in billion euros for 6 number of Airports.
The Costs in billion euros is appeared to be the highest at Airport Hong Kong (China) and lowest at Airport Berlin-Brandenburg (Germany).
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Costs in billion euros for 6 number of Airports.
The Costs in billion euros is highest at Airport Hong Kong (China) and lowest at Airport Berlin-Brandenburg (Germany).
The highest Airport Hong Kong (China) has 12.9 more Costs in billion euros than the lowest Airport Berlin-Brandenburg (Germany).
max_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Airport, and Costs in billion euros in each Airport on the y axis.
The Costs in billion euros is highest at Airport Hong Kong (China) and lowest at Airport Berlin-Brandenburg (Germany).
The highest Airport Hong Kong (China) has 12.9 more Costs in billion euros than the lowest Airport Berlin-Brandenburg (Germany).
The Airport Hong Kong (China) has the highest Costs in billion euros, followed by Kansai/Osaka (Japan), and Doha (Katar). Down to the Airport Berlin-Brandenburg (Germany) which is the lowest.
Similar Costs in billion euros is found in Airport Hong Kong (China), and Kansai/Osaka (Japan).
The Airport Hong Kong (China) has 1.7 times more Costs in billion euros than average.
